StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPoolFunc.onAtendance]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NwaID uniqueidentifier
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT e.StartDate, a.Show FROM USMC.PooleeAtendee a, USMC.Event e WHERE a.even.d = e.id AND PooleeId = @NwaID AND e.StartDate <= GETDATE() order by e.startdate END
